column1: The skeleton is the final key; every door opens to it.  Occult Fragment
Death wears no mask, for it is the mask itself.  Hermetic Aphorism
All rivers empty into the skullâ€™s black sea.  Mystical Fragment
Transformation begins where flesh forgets itself.  Alchemical Saying
The Reaper counts not years but breaths.  Esoteric Whisper
In the harvest of bones, all crowns are equal.  Gnostic Fragment
